sections.heading: Same; charge as to verdict acquitting on account of insanityThe court shall charge the jury that if it acquits a defendant on account of a plea of insanity it shall state that the defendant was found not guilty by reason of insanity
sections.text: Same; charge as to verdict acquitting on account of insanityThe court shall charge the jury that if it acquits a defendant on account of a plea of insanity it shall state that the defendant was found not guilty by reason of insanity.
